item.title: By: Mike Waters

item.description: Thanks, Pastor Sam. Excellent. A group of men from church are studying the confession with the help of your exposition. We just finished chapter two. Very helpful.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Pastor Sam. Excellent. A group of men from church are studying the confession with the help of your exposition. We just finished chapter two. Very helpful.
